No, no, no, no, no.  They say it's the same as the distance from the tip of a guy's thumb to the tip of his index finger.

It's not... It's just... Okay. I'm going through my mail and I open up their monthly, you know, statement!
Easy.
And then, there's five hundred extra dollars in my account.

Oh, yes.  Because now I have to go down there and deal with them.

It's not mine.  I didn't earn it. If I kept it, it would be like stealing.
Yeah, but if you spent it, it would be like shopping.

dust hold on a second, all right? Just think about what you went through the last time you quit.

I know, I know.  I just wish that once I'd bring a guy home they actually liked.

Yeah. Well, you didn't know Chi Chi.

We promise.
We promise.

like, he made us into a team.

kay. I think it's time to change somebody's nicotine patch.
